lines.name: HOMER
lines.line_text: Just tell me. I'll do whatever you want to do.

lines.name: HOMER
lines.line_text: Isn't that like waiting and seeing?

lines.name: CANDY
lines.line_text: No. Nothing is nothing. I want Wally to come home. I'm afraid to see him too.

lines.name: CANDY
lines.line_text: No don't--that's something. Nothing is nothing. Don't even look at me. I want...
